qti-assessment-item.title: Compare numbers on a vertical number line

qti-item-body.p: Use the number line to compare the numbers.

qti-item-body.p:
On the number line, -1.4 is
above below
-6.4.

This means -1.4 is
greater than less than
-6.4.

qti-content-body.p: Correct! On a vertical number line, numbers higher up are greater. Since -1.4 is above -6.4, it is the greater number.
Not quite. Look at the positions on the number line. -1.4 is located higher up than -6.4. This means -1.4 is above -6.4, and therefore -1.4 is greater than -6.4.
